project_abstract.cdata: The Higher Education Reform Project for China aims to improve the quality and relevance of undergraduate basic science and engineering programs through integrated reform activities in curriculum and teaching methodology. There are three project components. The first a) renews and restructures the science and engineering disciplines by reducing narrow specializations, restructuring academic programs of study, and introducing new integrative science and engineering courses; b) adopts student-centered learning strategies, updates textbooks, makes laboratories, computer facilities, and library resources more readily accessible; and establishes well-equipped integrated laboratory centers and c) upgrades teachers and staff in support of reforms such as providing continuous training and promoting information exchange among staff. The second component funds innovative forms of cooperation. The third component funds project activities that support institutional capacity for change such as a) policy-based research studies; b) course and textbook revision; c) development of electronic teaching and learning materials; d) nationally-organized technical assistance that trains implementation personnel; e) overseas study tours and workshops; and f) overall coordination, monitoring, and evaluation.

P046051.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>高等教育改革项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目旨在通过开展课程和教学方法改革活动提高本科基础科学和工程学学科教育质量和相关性。本项目设有三个子项目。第一个子项目将（1）减少狭义专门化现象，调整学术研究课程结构，引入新型一体化科学和工程学课程，进而改革并调整科学和工程学学科；（2）实施生本学习战略，更新教材，使实验室、计算机设施和图书馆资源更便于学生使用，建立装备良好的综合性中心实验室；（3）通过诸如提供持续培训和促进教员间的信息交流等措施提升教员能力，为改革提供支撑。第三个子项目资助可支持增强机构能力的项目活动，如（1）政策研究工作；（2）课程和教材修订；（3）电子化教学和学习资料开发；（4）由国家组织的旨在培训实施人员的技术援助；（5）国际考察研讨；（6）总体协调、监测和评价。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
